attributes.additional_details: We are leaving the European Union and this should free up the public purse strings. We as the general public already pay tax when we work and shop. Council tax is an unfair and broken system. This needs to stop.
attributes.background: It's about time the Government finally scrapped the rebranded poll tax aka council tax, and funded local government centrally.

departments.name: Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government
